name: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation
summary: The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation (BNY Mellon) is a leading American international financial services company, recognized as the world's largest custodian bank and securities services provider. Founded in 1784, it offers asset management, custody, investment, and wealth management services to corporations, institutions, and individuals globally. Headquartered in New York City, BNY Mellon manages over $2 trillion in assets and administers more than $52 trillion in assets, serving clients in over 35 countries.
